title: True or False (1 point each, 25 total)
instructions: Select True or False for each statement (read CAREFULLY).

questions.question: The first electronic games were made for arcades.
8-bit refers to the framerate of a computer.
The years of 1983 – 1985 was considered the crash of the games industry.
Emergent gameplay is when players have only one solution to one problem.
Consoles are always sold for a large profit.
The Marufuku Company founded in 1889 changed its name in 1951 to the Nintendo Video Game Company.
The ESRB was created by North American governments to regulate video game releases.
The most technically powerful console usually sells the most units.
Player empathy is the concept of a player feeling what their character is feeling.
Making a game more realistic will make it more fun.
Narratology emphasizes a focus on story and views games as a medium for storytelling.
One of the principles in game design is to establish good player pacing.
Many of the earliest board games were representations of racing and war games.
Like with genres for other media like sci-fi novels and fantasy movies, video game genres usually describe the story content of the game.
Though polish is important, if a novel game feature is still not completely perfect, there can still be value in releasing it.
Inventory management plays a significant role in RPG games.
Feature creep is adding new features to the game during the design phase, early in the development process.
The Technical Director’s responsibility is to help the program leads design the architecture of the code for their games, develop the coding standards, and set up the programming schedules.
Important aspect to consider when making a game is: make it challenging, balanced, and easy to get into.
Pre-Production is when the team focuses on creating the specification documentation and prototypes for the game.
Content are game systems. Things like player abilities, dialogue trees, inventory menus, save/load, etc are features.
The Board of Directors at a company advises the Creative Director
The three types of management at large game corporations are Executive, Functional, and Operational Management.
A commit is a snapshot of your repository at a specific point in time that represents a set of changes. It is initially an addition to your local repository
It is never good to defy the established mechanics and tropes of a genre when designing a game.
